title: Searching for Meaning in the Life of Ellen Johnson-Sirleaf: A Call to Meaningful Responses to Tragedies - PMC

quotes: The information in this section is gleaned from Johnson-Sirleaf's autobiography: This child will be great: Memoir of a remarkable life by Africa's first woman president (Johnson-Sirleaf, 2010), unless stated otherwise.
